title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve
title_original: Arssm Women's Faux Fur Coat Fluffy Shaggy Jacket Long Sleeve Lapel Coats Winter Warm Outwear

specs.Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Obsessed
items.body: I was honestly surprised by how luxurious this coat feels for the price! The faux fur is soft and plush, with a nice weight that gives it a high-end feel without the high-end cost. It’s stylish enough to dress up for a night out but also looks great with jeans and boots for a casual winter day. The fit is true to size, and the lining keeps you warm without being bulky. I’ve received so many compliments already—and most people can’t believe it’s not real fur. For the price, it’s an absolute steal. If you’re looking for a budget-friendly fur coat that doesn’t sacrifice style or comfort, this one’s definitely worth grabbing. Read more
items.author: alyssa RAMSTAD

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as fluffy as photos
items.body: It’s not as thick and fluffy as the photo appears. It’s just okay. Fit well and has lining. It’s just not fluffy. Read more
items.author: Traci Tignor

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Get fluffy with blow dryer
items.body: Hit it with the blow dryer!!! Read more
items.author: melissa callahan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and pretty coat!
items.body: Love it! Wore it for an outdoor wedding because it was really cold outside. I received many compliments. It’s very soft and comfy. I normally wear a medium but returned for a small just because I planned on wearing a thin dress under it not a bulky sweater, so wanted it to fit closer to my body. Read more
items.author: CJL

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sooooo Cozy
items.body: Wow. super soft jacket. It has large snaps to close, but they aren't visible. Great value for the price Read more
items.author: Monica W.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous fur coat
items.body: Quality is amazing, it looks so gorgeous and fits all my outfit. This fake fur coat is also warm enough up to -5 C but when windy, you feel it. Read more
items.author: Alina A.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Winered, Pink, Apricot, Black, Coffee. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
